author: Prof. Vikram Patel
title: New AI Lab Inauguration
content: Excited to announce the inauguration of our state-of-the-art AI and Machine Learning Laboratory. Students now have access to cutting-edge computing resources for research projects.

author: Student Representative
title: Campus Internship Drive
content: Great news! Top tech companies are visiting campus next week for internship recruitment. Register now at the placement office. Best of luck to all candidates!

author: Prof. Ramesh Kumar
title: Case Study Competition Announcement
content: Participate in our inter-college case study competition. Top 3 teams will get mentorship from industry leaders. Last date to register: 20th January.
